header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Experienced full-stack software engineer with six years developing scalable distributed systems, streaming data platforms, and event-driven architectures. Understanding of how to build mission-critical systems serving millions of users across entertainment, blockchain, and construction industries. Strong expertise in schema management, real-time data processing, CI/CD pipelines, and both functional and object-oriented programming paradigms. AWS certified with entrepreneurial startup experience.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.detail: Architected and maintained a critical streaming data platform serving 50+ engineering teams across Disney+ and Hulu, processing millions of real-time events through AWS Kinesis streams with DynamoDB-backed consumer state management

Built a stream-snapshot state management system integrated into the company's unified content metadata catalog, enabling teams to maintain application state from high-throughput event streams for television, movie, and sports content
Developed a robust schema registry using OpenAPI and AWS Smithy schemas with backwards and forwards compatibility validation ensuring safe deployments across distributed services

Implemented multi-language code generation pipelines producing Java, Scala, and Python artifacts with JSON and Protobuf serialization, plus Avro and Protobuf schema files for third-party tooling integration
Designed CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and GitHub Actions for automated schema validation, compatibility checking, stakeholder approval workflows, and semantic versioning
Engineered real-time data lake integrations using Spark, Databricks, and S3 enabling analytics teams to perform machine learning workflows and generate executive dashboards from Kinesis stream data

experience.title: Blockchain Platform Engineer
experience.detail: Developed core runtime components for a proof-of-stake blockchain platform using Scala Akka actors, implementing distributed consensus algorithms and TCP-based peer-to-peer networking protocols for ethical supply chain verification
Built a fault-tolerant distributed node network with a comprehensive HTTP management API enabling secure transaction signing, staking key management, and node configuration
Created a high-performance transaction streaming client using Scala http4s, Cats Effect, and MongoDB with a custom querying DSL and Protobuf API for real-time blockchain data indexing
Designed React-based user interfaces including a transaction monitoring dashboard for non-technical users and a Chrome extension for virtual wallet management

experience.title: Software Engineer I & II
experience.detail: Developed full-stack solutions for a construction project management platform serving thousands of users with complex organizational workflows for submittals, RFIs, issues, and documents

Built an event-sourced change order tracking system with immutable audit trails, cross-entity referencing capabilities, and Kafka stream integration to the flagship enterprise resource management application

Implemented a microservices architecture using C# ASP.NET on Azure cloud infrastructure with MSSQL databases, spanning database modeling, REST APIs, and responsive Angular web UI components with TypeScript and RxJS
Collaborated using Git and Azure DevOps for source code management, build pipelines, and ticket tracking

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
experience.detail: Designed a comprehensive test automation framework enabling non-technical team members to define and execute complex test scenarios using simple C# interfaces
Built an API testing framework for microservices validation and a Selenium-based UI testing framework with XPath navigation for headless and browser-based test execution
Executed regular performance testing using JMeter and Locust to simulate thousands of concurrent user scenarios, ensuring system scalability and responsiveness under high loads
Established quality assurance processes and comprehensive test case documentation for manual and automated testing procedures, reducing production defects
